title: "Your party has been disbanded" during champ select, kicking me to home screen
body: This has happened twice today, where I will be in champ select with a friend, and suddenly get removed from the game and placed in the home screen with a message "your party has been disbanded". However she is still in champ select with me dodging because I cannot select a champion, as I am not at the screen. I have looked around but can find nothing similar to this, so I have made this post.

replies.body: It almost sounds as if something cut off your network's connection to the game server you were going to be playing on. Let's take a quick minute to go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to double check for any odd network settings. If that doesn't seem to help out, hit me back and we'll dig a little deeper!

Thanks for the quick response Broporo. I have used most of these listed options now, as well as the hextech repair tool. After the hextech repair tool alone I did not receive the issue, however it was not an every game one to begin with. I'll let you know if it happens again
